channel.title: Posts on Tom's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Tom's Blog

item.title: 「Go系列」interface是如何实现的？
item.description: Go语言提供interface类型作为接口类型，声明interface时候会把其方法定义在一起，任何其他类型只要实现了这些方法就是实现了这个接口。不同

item.title: 「Go系列」浅探一下Go语言的类型系统
item.description: Go语言是强类型语言，编译器在编译阶段会给代码中每一种类型生成对应的类型描述信息并写入到二进制可执行文件中，这些类型描述信息就被称为“类型元数据”。 G

item.title: Diagram Support
item.description: Eureka supports the rendering of diagrams by using Mermaid.

item.title: Math Support
item.description: Eureka supports the rendering of mathematical formulas by using KaTeX.

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Emoji Support
item.description: Emoji can be enabled in a Hugo project in a number of ways.
